org.jetel.graph.analyse

Class AbstractGraphProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.analyse.AbstractGraphProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingleGraphProvider

    public abstract class AbstractGraphProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphProvider
    Common ancestor for both implementation of GraphProvider interface. This abstract implementation is empty for now, can be used later.

      • isAllowedComponent

        protected boolean isAllowedComponent(Node component)
        RemoteEdgeComponent and SubJobInput/Output components are not processed in regular way.
        Returns:
        true for the component which are dedicated to be root of graph processing

      • setSubgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent

        public void setSubgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent(boolean subgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent)
        Description copied from interface: GraphProvider
        Sets the flag which indicates the SubgraphInput (or SubgraphOutput) component will be considered as single component. Otherwise, each port of SGI or SGO component represents separate 'component' entity for this graph provider. Default is false.
        Specified by:
        setSubgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent in interface GraphProvider

      • isSubgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent

        public boolean isSubgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent()
        Specified by:
        isSubgraphInputOutputAsSingleComponent in interface GraphProvider
        Returns:
        the flag which indicates the SubgraphInput (or SubgraphOutput) component will be considered as single component. Otherwise, each port of SGI or SGO component represents separate 'component' entity for this graph provider.

      • setSubgraphInputOutputVisibility

        public void setSubgraphInputOutputVisibility(boolean subgraphInputOutputVisibility)
        Description copied from interface: GraphProvider
        Sets the flag which indicates whether the SubgraphInput and SubgraphOutput components are part of provided graph. Default is false.
        Specified by:
        setSubgraphInputOutputVisibility in interface GraphProvider
